title: IN SRI LANKA WE GOT EVERYTHING IN ONE PLACE, SAYS SALMAN KHAN
content: July 01, 2010: Bolywood actor Salman Khan says that he changed the location of his next film ‘Ready’ from Mauritius to Sri Lanka due to the island’s unique combination of breathtaking beauty, infrastructure and warm, hospitable people. He disclosed this at a media briefing held in Colombo yesterday with the objective of creating awareness for…
